column1: Singaparna is the capital of Tasikmalaya Regency in West Java
column2: Indonesia. Singaparna is a district located 10 km to the west from Tasikmalaya city.

column1: The total area of SIngaparna Region is around 2
column2: 178.837 hectare divided into 10 administrative villages (desa). Most of the land in Singaparna used for habitation
